ygData.subject: Re: G1
ygData.msgSnippet: My personal theory is that the Transformers tried to become more like humans. Remember in G1 during FFoD The quintessons were not too happy about the humans

My personal theory is that the Transformers tried to become more like humans. 
Remember in G1 during FFoD The quintessons were not too happy about the 
humans helping the autobots because they were starting to act and think like 
them, thus becoming unpredictable, where as the Decepticons were. I think 
maybe in their efforts to become somewhat more human like something happened 
between Cybertron and Earth, something really bad and thus Earth was made a 
restricted area of space for cybertronians. Thats my two cents anyway.

--part1_3c.1a821257.29ba7ce4_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
